plays.text: Goal scored by Eric Brewer assisted by Jiri Dopita and Dan Cleary
Penalty to Derek Morris 2 minutes for Crosschecking Mike Comrie
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for High Sticking Ryan Smyth
Penalty to Eric Brewer 2 minutes for Crosschecking Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Ethan Moreau 5 minutes for Fighting Derek Morris
Penalty to Derek Morris 5 minutes for Fighting Ethan Moreau
Penalty to Ethan Moreau 2 minutes for Crosschecking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Ethan Moreau 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Joe Sakic and Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Joe Sakic 2 minutes for Tripping Brian Swanson
Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Charging Jiri Dopita
Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Janne Niinimaa and Mike York
Penalty to Georges Laraque 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Milan Hejduk
Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Tripping Jiri Dopita
Goal scored by Radim Vrbata assisted by Rob Blake and Martin Skoula
Goal scored by Peter Forsberg assisted by Steve Reinprecht and Radim Vrbata
Goal scored by Ryan Smyth assisted by Janne Niinimaa and Anson Carter
Penalty to Jason Chimera 2 minutes for Hooking Milan Hejduk
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for High Sticking Ryan Smyth
